Install:
1. miniconda:

bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh

enter yes

2. conda install -c conda-forge simbody


3. Test:

cd ~/Anas/evolution

../simbody/variety/build/walkerVis.o 2 0.9 0.05 0.25 0.7 0.1 0.1 0.45 1.04483965101 0.103197434771 0.103197434771 0.05 0.05 0.0563781951517 0.0563781951517 1045.61769037 1045.61769037 50158.0725399 50158.0725399 278.901958698 278.901958698 11711.9946915 11711.9946915 90 90 90 90 338.993151549 338.993151549 0.331588133356 0.331588133356 0.382240215954 0.382240215954 0.0402516773143 0.0402516773143 -0.00413684296882 -0.00413684296882

4.experiment:

python2 filename.dat 1

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/home/lima/anaconda3/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
